  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_100820</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_100820</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Separating pigments</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Trennen der Pigmente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Séparation des colorants</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Separando pigments</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Separazione dei pigmenti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χωρισμός των χρωστικών ουσιών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Separación de los pigmentos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is the first of four illustrations showing the steps to separate out pigments. A drop of solution is placed on a chromatography paper.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chromatography paper</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pigment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Separation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solution</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist das erste von vier Abbildungen, welche 
die Jobsteps zeigen, um sich aus Pigmenten zu trennen. Ein 
Tropfen der Lösung wird auf ein Chromatographiepapier plaziert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est le premier de quatre illustrations montrant
les étapes pour séparer hors des colorants. Une baisse de 
solution est placée sur un papier de chromatographie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é o primeiro de quatro ilustrações que 
mostram as etapas para separar para fora dos pigments. Uma gota 
da solução é colocada em um papel do chromatography.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è la prima di quattro illustrazioni che 
mostrano i punti per separare verso l'esterno i pigmenti. Una 
goccia della soluzione è disposta su una carta da cromatografia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι η πρώτη τεσσάρων απεικονίσεων που 
εμφανίζουν τα βήματα για να χωρίσει έξω τις χρωστικές ουσίες. 
Μια απελευθέρωση της λύσης τοποθετείται σε χαρτί 
χρωματογραφίας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Éste es el primer de cuatro ilustraciones que 
muestran los pasos de progresión para separarse fuera de los 
pigmentos. Una gota de la solución se pone en un papel de la 
cromatografía.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Chromatographiepapier</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Pigment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Trennung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lösung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">papier de chromatographie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">colorant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Séparation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">solution</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">papel do chromatography</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pigment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Separação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">solução</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">carta da cromatografia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">pigmento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">soluzione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χρωστική ουσία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χωρισμός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λύση</string>
          </keyword>
